name: Easy Email Checkout
author: Front Series

sections.description:
Easy Email Checkout for WooCommerce is a simple plugin that help the customers to select fast and easy, the email – domain providers from the list, while they typing their email.

The plugin helps your users not to make a mistake in entering the email domain, as well as not to switch the keyboard screen on mobile devices, looking for the @ symbol.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the folder ‘easy-email-checkoutto the/wp-content/plugins/` folder
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Go to plugin setting under Settings > Easy Email Checkout

short_description: Make the email field in checkout process easier for your customers by suggest autocomplete email services.
description:
